figma-local.description: Local Figma MCP server (requires Figma Desktop app with MCP enabled)

figma-remote.description: Remote Figma MCP server (no desktop app required)

setup: 1. Choose local or remote server configuration
2. For local: Enable MCP server in Figma Desktop (Dev Mode > Inspect > Enable desktop MCP server)
3. For remote: No additional setup needed
4. In Cursor: Ctrl+Shift+P > 'MCP: Add Server' > HTTP > Enter server URL

notes.beta: Figma MCP server is currently in open beta
notes.authentication: May require Figma authentication depending on file permissions
notes.limitations: Some features may have performance issues or bugs during beta
